snippet: The regional regulator plans to conduct another round of analysis starting in the first quarter of next year to check lenders’ ability to weather downturns.
abstract: DealBook Online; European Banking Authority says it will conduct another round of stress tests on banks starting in first quarter of 2016.
lead_paragraph: The regional regulator plans to conduct another round of analysis starting in the first quarter of next year to check lenders’ ability to weather downturns.

headline.main: Banks in Europe to Face New Stress Tests in 2016
